channel.title: Crown help
channel.description: I am using a 317 delta source I was wondering how do i add: donator rank super donator server support also how do i seprerate the crown for owner and admin How do i add the rank (like server support) to the source and make the picture of the crown link with the rank, i am new to coding and i do not understand. what file in the client changes how to crowns correspond with the ranks ingame

item.title: Crown help
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Adding the actual ranks is server sided.

For crowns, youâ€™ll need to add the specific sprite into the client files. There are many tutorials on this.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/308663-317-adding-donator-crown-client-sided.html
http://www.runelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?52125-PI-HOW-TO-ADD-NEW-CROWNS-AND-NEW-PLAYER-RIGHTS-TO-YOUR-SERVER!!-PI-no-pics-sorry

etc. Also, keep it one thread per question.

Read full topic
